pages.text: $(li)Activator Rails are a variant of the common Rail.$(br)$(li)This kind of Rail works as Redstone Dust, it can transport input redstone signals, but only with others Activator Rails.

$(li)They can active an specific kind of Minecarts, like the Minecart with TNT.$(br)$(li)Any Minecart that is on top of an Activator Rail will start shaking, kicking you out of the Minecart if you're mount in it.
